com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.utils

Class Packager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.utils.Packager

  • public class Packager
extends java.lang.Object
    Packager zips experiment output results along with the input and moves them into folder containing completed experiments.
    Since:
    3.0
    Version:
    24/08/2013
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit

    • Method Detail

      • pack

        public static java.io.File pack(java.lang.String outputName)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Zip the Input and Output folders and place them in the completed Folder. Uses the default LaunchSetup Object defined.
        Parameters:
        outputName - Name of output File.
        Returns:
        output zip File.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Unable to find destination.
        java.io.IOException - Unable to complete task.
        See Also:
        Program.getInstance(), Program.getLaunchSetup()

      • pack

        public static java.io.File pack(java.lang.String outputName,
                LaunchSetup sp)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Zip the Input and Output folders and place them in the completed Folder.
        Parameters:
        outputName - Name of output File.
        sp - LaunchSetup Object containing input configuration.
        Returns:
        output zip File.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Unable to find destination.
        java.io.IOException - Unable to complete task.
        Since:
        4.0

      • move

        public static void move(java.lang.String src,
        java.lang.String dest)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Move a file or directory from source to destination.
        Parameters:
        src - Source file name (can be directory).
        dest - Output file name (can be name of directory).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Unable to find destination.
        java.io.IOException - Unable to complete task.

      • zip

        public static void zip(java.lang.String src,
       java.lang.String filename)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Zip a given source file into a zip file.
        WARNING: empty folders will not be zipped
        Parameters:
        src - name of file or directory to zip.
        filename - name of output zip file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Unable to find destination.
        java.io.IOException - Unable to complete task.
